name: Nahmii
intro: Layer 2 scaling protocol for the Ethereum blockchain
introduce: Nahmii is a layer 2 scaling protocol for the Ethereum blockchain which provides throughput, low latency, instant finality and predictable fees. In addition to its top tier performance, Nahmii is also uniquely capable of addressing institutional use cases by enabling developers to comply with KYC/AML and other regulatory requirements on demand.
